text: (nabiye! ovunta) mese pavasanu: “obata allahge danduvama pæminiyahot, nætahot obata viniscaya kalaya pæminiyahot, allah novana (me) dæyada oba, (obage udavvata) aradhana karanneya yanna oba sita bæluvehuda? (mema piliru obage devivarun yayi pavasana) oba ætta kiyannan vasayen sitinnehu nam, (evavama obage udavvata aradhana karanu)”
